body:
# Components

## Application Security Management (IAST)

* :bug: Fix IllegalFormatConversionException StringModuleImpl#onStringFormat (#9907 - @jandro996)

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :bug: Fix API Security sampling in standalone mode (#10165 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: AI Guard - Ensure messages are not modified before span serialization (#10116 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Build & Tooling

* :sparkles: Remove native libraries for unsupported environment (#10079 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Configuration

* :bug: Using stable config when a security manager is enabled should not prevent tracer startup (#10006 - @amarziali)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :sparkles: Add support for Weaver Framework v0.11 (#10012 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Crash Tracking

* :bug: Don't send crash-ping to error tracking if not enabled (#10170 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Improve OOM parsing for Zulu8 (#10038 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Store some crashtracking options on initialisation (#10036 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Dual ship to error tracking (#10000 - @amarziali)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :bug: Fix Kafka consumer instrumentation (#10100 - @piochelepiotr)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :bug: Fix metric expressions with `@return` (#10178 - @jpbempel)
* :broom: fix method reference in comment (#10101 - @andreimatei)
* :sparkles: Make SymbolDB stand alone (#10064 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Make Code Origin fingerprint map concurrent (#10043 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Disable CodeOrigin by default (#10027 - @jpbempel)
* :bug::zap: Avoid expensive `Class.getMethod` call in code-origin advice (#10019 - @mcculls)

## Metrics

* :sparkles::zap: Avoid getTag overhead in ConflatingMetricsAggregator (#10070 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Only enable client side stats if the host agent is at least 7.65.0 (#10041 - @bric3)

## Platform

* :sparkles: Improve support for virtual thread detection (#9852 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Profiling

* :sparkles: Bump ddprof-java to 1.34.4 (#10097 - @jbachorik)
* :bug: Fix deadlock in dd-task-scheduler (#10096 - @rkennke)

## Realtime User Monitoring

* :bug: Filter setContentType headers (#10150 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Prevent any Content-Length header from being set upon injection (#10081 - @amarziali)

## Telemetry

* :sparkles: Don't send OutOfMemoryError to the telemetry (#10211 - @amarziali)

## Trace context propagation

* :sparkles: Add context tracking support for virtual threads (#10040 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Tracer core

* :sparkles: Don't send IO failures to telemetry logs (#10210 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Avoid NPE on BaseDecorator (#10209 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Support `aot_training` mode to be used when creating AOT caches (#10166 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles::zap: Optimize TagMap lookup & insertion for String literals (#10138 - @dougqh)
* :bug: Remove colons from process tags values (#10109 - @vandonr)
* :bug: Fix field-injection of ForkJoinTask on Java 25 (#10084 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles::zap: Use `ClassLoaderValue`s to track class-loader state (#10075 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles::zap: Add primitive setters to DDSpanContext to take advantage of TagMap (#10018 - @dougqh)
* :bug: Safely handle Files.exist on discovery and config when a Security Manager is present (#10009 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Avoid SpanBuilder allocation for startSpan (#9998 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Add request-id to lambda start/end invocation calls (#9991 - @ojproductions)
* :sparkles::zap: Use `ClassLoaderIndex` to index class-loader related information (#9980 - @mcculls)
* :zap::broom: Use `ClassNameFilter` to track uninteresting classes (#9976 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles::zap: Reduce PendingTrace Lock Contention (#9932 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Remove dependency on `memfd_create` for  service discovery (#9913 - @raphaelgavache)

# Instrumentations

## Apache Spark instrumentation

* :bug: Support Spark 4.1 by removing mention to StreamExecution class (#10228 - @aboitreaud)
* :sparkles: Duplicate service name in meta so it's not truncated in spark integration (#10063 - @aboitreaud)
* :sparkles: Add dd_tags into djm.tags spark.application span attribute (#10004 - @pawel-big-lebowski)

## AWS SDK instrumentation

* :bulb: Add inject Datadog attribute config (#9943 - @ojproductions)

## Core Java language instrumentation

* :sparkles: Add context tracking support for virtual threads (#10040 - @PerfectSlayer)

## JDBC instrumentation

* :bug: Log injection issues in JDBC only once + promote to WARN (#10214 - @vandonr)
* :bulb: Add a feature flag to disable extra calls to the DB in JDBC instrumentation (#9774 - @vandonr)

## Kafka instrumentation

* :bug: Fix Kafka consumer instrumentation (#10100 - @piochelepiotr)
* :bug: Extract trace context from Kafka producer record headers (#10020 - @PlugaruT - thanks for the contribution!)

## Servlet instrumentation

* :bug: Avoid NPE when enumerating servlet headers (#10213 - @amarziali)

## Spring instrumentation

* :bug: Make spring-webflux instrumentation compatible with 7.0.0 (#10110 - @amarziali)

## All other instrumentations

* :bug: Avoid NPE on QuartzDecorator (#10181 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Avoid NPE when setting resource with null path (#10180 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Fix `VerifyError` when instrumenting `org.apache.synapse.transport.passthru.SourceHandler` (#10154 - @mcculls)
* :bug: Ensure compatibility with jboss modules 2.2 (#10111 - @amarziali)
